ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "Frontier",
OR( ISBLANK(WLP_Sales_Buddy_Username__c), ISBLANK(Sales_Buddy_Username__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the WLP & Sales Buddy Username before saving record.
